meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Metis GRC is a cybersecurity startup building the future of governance, risk, and compliance. Based in Portugal, serving Europe.

hero.title: Building the Future of Cybersecurity GRC
hero.subtitle: We're cybersecurity practitioners who lived the compliance challenges firsthand — and built Metis GRC to solve them.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Organizations shouldn't have to choose between security and simplicity. We bridge the gap between regulatory complexity and operational reality with an AI-powered platform that makes cybersecurity GRC accessible, efficient, and actionable.
mission.p2: Metis GRC was born from the frustration of managing multi-framework compliance with spreadsheets, scattered tools, and manual processes. We believe there's a better way — and we're building it.

items.title: Security-First
items.desc: We practice what we preach. Our platform is built with enterprise-grade security — encryption at rest and in transit, row-level isolation, and comprehensive audit logging.

items.title: AI-Driven
items.desc: We believe AI should amplify human expertise, not replace it. Our nine assistants handle the heavy lifting so teams can focus on strategic decisions that matter.

items.title: European DNA
items.desc: Built in Portugal, hosted in the EU, designed for European regulatory reality. We understand NIS2, GDPR, and the EU compliance landscape from the inside.

items.title: Customer-Obsessed
items.desc: Every feature starts with a real problem faced by CISOs, GRC managers, and compliance officers. We build what practitioners actually need.

team.title: Our Team
team.p1: Our team brings over 20 years of cybersecurity experience across consulting, healthcare, financial services, utilities, and more. We've led GRC programs, managed compliance audits, responded to incidents, and assessed hundreds of vendors.
team.p2: We've lived the compliance challenges firsthand — the endless spreadsheets, the duplicated work across frameworks, the scramble to meet reporting deadlines. Metis GRC is the platform we wished we had.

location.title: Based in Portugal, Serving Europe
location.desc: Our platform is hosted entirely within the European Union, ensuring full data residency compliance. Built for the European regulatory landscape, designed for global ambition.

meta.title: AI Assistants
meta.description: Nine AI assistants embedded across Metis GRC — regulatory Q&A, evidence classification, cross-framework mapping, and more.

hero.title: AI-Powered GRC Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Nine assistants embedded across the platform. Your data stays in the EU. AI processes in-context only.

assistants.title: Regulatory Q&A
assistants.desc: Ask questions about any supported framework in plain language. Get instant answers with references to specific articles, controls, and obligations. No more searching through hundreds of pages of regulation.
assistants.example: "What are the NIS2 incident reporting requirements for essential entities in Germany?"

assistants.title: Control Explanation
assistants.desc: Understand what each control means in practical terms. The AI explains requirements, suggests implementation approaches, and provides examples tailored to your organization size and industry.
assistants.example: "Explain ISO 27001 A.8.2 and how it applies to a healthcare SaaS company."

assistants.title: Assessment Assistance
assistants.desc: Upload your evidence and let AI propose maturity/compliance levels with detailed justification. Accelerate assessments from weeks to days while maintaining rigor and consistency.
assistants.example: AI reviews your access control policy and suggests "Partially Implemented" with specific gaps identified.

assistants.title: Evidence Classification
assistants.desc: Drop documents into the evidence repository and AI automatically tags them with relevant controls, frameworks, and sensitivity levels. OCR processing handles scanned documents.
assistants.example: Upload a penetration test report → auto-tagged to 5 controls across NIS2 and ISO 27001.

assistants.title: Cross-Framework Mapping
assistants.desc: Discover control equivalences across NIS2, ISO 27001, NIST CSF, and CIS Controls. Eliminate duplicate work by mapping a single control implementation to multiple framework requirements.
assistants.example: NIS2 Art. 21(2)(a) ↔ ISO A.5.1 ↔ NIST GV.PO-01 ↔ CIS Control 1

assistants.title: Remediation Planning
assistants.desc: Generate prioritized action plans with suggested owners, effort estimates, and timelines. AI considers your current maturity, available resources, and regulatory deadlines.
assistants.example: AI generates a 90-day NIS2 remediation plan with 23 tasks across 4 workstreams.

assistants.title: Report Generation
assistants.desc: Draft board-ready executive summaries and detailed compliance reports in minutes. Choose from CISO dashboard views, audit preparation reports, or regulatory submission formats.
assistants.example: Generate a 2-page board briefing on NIS2 readiness with risk highlights and action items.

assistants.title: Risk Recommendations
assistants.desc: Based on your asset inventory, control landscape, and industry context, AI identifies risks you may not have considered. Suggests likelihood and impact scores with reasoning.
assistants.example: AI identifies 3 supply chain risks based on your vendor questionnaire responses.

assistants.title: Predictive Gap Analysis
assistants.desc: Early warning system that monitors compliance trends and predicts where degradation is likely. Alerts before controls expire, evidence becomes stale, or risks exceed thresholds.
assistants.example: Alert: 4 controls predicted to fall below threshold in Q3 based on evidence expiry dates.
